pages.text: Chaos is the most chaotic of all forces for sure. Predicting it seems pretty unreasonable; however, an Alchemist may see certain patterns emerging... $(br)Chaos may be used in a $(marked)Ritual$() to create 'chaotic' items.

The ritual is performed with the $(l:manipulation/entry_nexus)$(item)Dimensional Nexus$() and requires a greater power of Chaos, manifested in $(l:alchemy/entry_entropizing_catalyst)$(item)Entropizing Catalysts$(). $(br)In order to achieve results, the items to be affected must be tossed near the altar before the rite ends.
